faq:{title:'Frequently Asked Questions?',description:'Find answers about our 3D character services, course development and educational platform.',questions:{q1:{question:'What does the 3D character service include?',answer:'Our packages include: character design, basic animations (gestures and movements), integration with your educational content, and ready-to-use formats for your platform (MP4, FBX or OBJ).
